text: The 2019–20 season was Al-Batin's 41st year in their existence and their first back season in the MS League. Al-Batin were relegated to the second tier of Saudi football after finishing 15th in the 2018–19 Saudi Pro League. The club participated in the MS League and the King Cup. The season covered the period from 1 July 2019 to 20 September 2020. ==Players== ===Squad information=== ==Transfers and loans== ===Transfers in=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- !
